_header: If thou givest him eaten enough then must him sleepen
_description: On the slothful man — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝef þu ȝeuest him eten inou þanne must him
                    slepenȝef þu ȝeuest him hunger þannewil he
                    wepenȝef þu ȝeuest him richesse þanne wil he
                    rote& ȝef þu ȝef him pouerte þan can he don no
                    note
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 5.
